create.title: Image Generator - <1>Create</1>
text: Explore AI image generation using text-to-image prompts.
COP supports only Korean text prompts.
With our AI-help feature, generate higher-quality, more detailed images.

edit.tit: Easily edit your images after generation
edit.title: Image editing - <1>Edit</1>
text: Improve your images through post-processing with a variety of editing tools. Remove, replace, or expand backgrounds, selective edit, upscale images, and more- all designed to make content creation easier and faster with superior quality.

smartAd.title: Ad creative generator - <1>Smart AD</1>
text: The generated images can be automatically resized and varied to the formats of major domestic ad platforms. This reduces repetitive work for creators and speeds up the preparation for ad launch.

editCards.title: Remove background
editCards.desc:
AI automatically detects and removes complex
backgrounds instantly with just one click.

editCards.title: Replace background
editCards.desc:
AI accurately separates the main objects from
the background and replaces it naturally while
keeping the key objects.

editCards.title: Expand background
editCards.desc:
AI analyzes the image style and extends
the background and fill in cropped areas and
blank spaces seamlessly.

editCards.title: Selective Editing
editCards.desc:
When you select areas with the brush or lasso tool
to remove or replace elements, AI automatically
refines the result for a natural finish.

editCards.title: Upscaling
editCards.desc:
AI enhances low-resolution images naturally and
upgrades them to optimal high-resolution quality
with just a few clicks.

featureSection.title: COP Features
featureSection.subtitle: COP offers the following key features for user convenience

cards.title: Korean Prompt Support
cards.desc: Optimized for Korean prompts, allowing you to generate natural and detailed images

cards.title: AI-help Support
cards.desc:
Even with short words or simple ideas,
AI automatically generates refined
prompts for you

cards.title: Quick Prompt Support
cards.desc:
Analyzes popular topics and styles
by category to provide curated prompts

cards.title: Custom Service Support
cards.desc:
Adopt only the features you need, delivered in 
a format optimized for your environment

cards.title: Brand Optimized Creation
cards.desc: Generates images using algorithms optimized for a specific company’s brand or products

cards.title:
Optimized for
 Hands-On Workflows
cards.desc:
Generate, Edit, Finalize, and
Vary—an AI workflow all in one platform
